column6: went to be with the lord on tuesday
column10: sc to the late gaines obed hall and carrie poore hall. shortly after graduating from calhoun falls high school
column11: alice moved to greenville and enrolled at carolina business college and worked part time for timmons insurance company and later on with lawton lumber company where she was a secretary for many years. she was a member of saluda hill baptist church and for many years enjoyed playing the piano and organ. in her later years
column12: alice loved to make baby receiving blankets and donated them to hope for mothers in easley and also shriners hospital for crippled children. surviving are her daughter: alice virginia ginger (claude) clamp of travelers rest; sister: martha peace of calhoun falls; two grandchildren; four great-grandchildren; three great-great-grandchildren and many nieces and nephews. graveside services will be saturday
column14: 2015 at 11:00 a. m. at woodlawn memorial park in greenville. a very special thank you to the most adoring caregiver
column16: who was like a daughter to alice. they had so much fun together. alice had the most loving grandchildren and neighbors that anyone would dream of having and she was very thankful for all that they have done for her. in lieu of flowers
column17: memorials may be made to the following: saluda hill baptist church
column24: sc 29602. online condolences may be expressed to the family at thehowzemortuary@yahoo. com. the howze mortuary
column25: travelers rest is in charge of the arrangements. (864) 834-8051. upcoming events. servicejun 13. 11:00 am - 11:30 am gravesideus
